message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We have plenty of rounds to negotiate!
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is a fair starting point. We both get a good amount, and it leaves room for more negotiation later.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 48/52 in your favor. We can't keep rejecting each other, or we'll both lose out.
